levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases slightly</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attacks inflict <$ba.cold>Cold</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@cold}</> seconds to the target; If the target is already <$ba.frozen>Frozen</>, the attack will instead deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as damage
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants 9 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
